title: Why people and AI make good business partners | Shervin Khodabandeh
itunes:author: Shervin Khodabandeh
description: What happens when the data-driven capabilities of AI are combined with human creativity and ingenuity? Shining a light on the opportunities this futuristic collaboration could bring to the workplace, AI expert Shervin Khodabandeh shares how to redesign companies so that people and machines can learn from each other.
itunes:subtitle: Why people and AI make good business partners | Shervin Khodabandeh
